articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Pyongyang International Airport
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Pyongyang International Airport
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the construction site of Pyongyang International Airport and set forth tasks for developing the area of the airport as required by the new century.
					 He, to begin with, went round various places of the Terminal 2 of Pyongyang International Airport to learn in detail about its construction.
					
					 He pointed out that he gave the task for finishing the project in such a way as to ensure that the Juche character and national identity are preserved in the construction while applying the world trend and what is good from other countries during his last inspection of the construction site of Terminal 2, but it has not been carried out.
					
					 He said there were deviations in the interior layout including halls for check-in and departure and service network and other facilities are not distributed to match the space of the terminal, adding if construction is done that way, it may be a copy of the terminal of a country.
					
					 "Defects were manifested in the last phase of the construction of the Terminal 2 because the designers failed to bear in mind the party's idea of architectural beauty that it is the life and soul and core in architecture to preserve the Juche character and national identity", he said, and went on:
					
					 "When we build even a single structure, we should do in such a way as to ensure that our style, our characteristic feature and national identity are preserved. It is necessary to finish the construction of the terminal to be an icon of Songun Korea, the face of the country and the gateway to Pyongyang and properly distribute service network and facilities and build them to be impeccable so that they may provide the best convenience to the passengers".
					
					 He instructed officials to stop for the time being the finishing project of the interior now under way, examine layout designs and complete the modified ones. 
					
					 Going round the runway of Pyongyang International Airport which has been completed, in the main, he learned about its paving and various markings. 
					
					 Watching the runway extending far away with satisfaction, he noted with pleasure that the reconstruction in a modern way  of the runway on which President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il left inerasable footprints for the cause of independence against imperialism and the cause of world revolution made it possible to add brilliance to their  undying leadership feats. 
					
					 He praised the soldier- builders for successfully building the runway as intended by the party and gave an instruction to qualitatively wind up the remaining project.
					
					 Then he examined a relief model of the area of the airport and set forth a task for developing it as required by the new century.
					
					 He clarified his idea of building in the future a new terminal and runway opposite to the airport now under construction and railways for express train and highway from the heart of the capital city to the airport to turn it into the world-class one.
					
					 He stressed the need to build the area of the airport in such a way as to make it look magnificent and fashionable so that it may show the proud appearance of the DPRK's socialist system and the standard of a highly civilized nation.
					
					 He also gave an instruction to facelift the Sunan area, build peculiar green houses in the farm field of Sunan district near the airport and convert Thaekam-ri and Wonhwa-ri associated with the leadership feats of the President and Kim Jong Il into model farms of the world level. 
					
					 He indicated tasks and ways for the development projects including the issues of properly deciding the order of priority in developing the area of the airport, working out best  designs, fixing  time for groundbreaking and taking measures for providing manpower and building materials, etc. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Premier of the Cabinet Pak Pong Ju, Vice-Marshal of the KPA Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Nung O, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Lieut. General of the KPA Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets with Ugandan PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets with Ugandan PM
						
 Kampala, October 31 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Ruhakana Rugunda, prime minister of Uganda, at the building of the Ugandan government on Oct. 31.
					 The prime minister warmly welcomed Kim Yong Nam's visit to Uganda and expressed the will to boost cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 Present there were Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Kil Bok, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, Myong Kyong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Uganda, and other suite members and Moses Ali, second deputy prime minister, Tarsis Kabwejere, minister for General Affairs of the prime minister's office, Asuman Kiyingi, acting foreign minister, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Inter-Sector Talks between DPRK and Uganda Held
articles.content:
Inter-Sector Talks between DPRK and Uganda Held
						
 Kampala, October 31 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Inter-sector talks between the DPRK and the Republic of Uganda took place in Kampala on Friday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and So Kil Bok, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, and from the Ugandan side were the minister of State for the Ministry of Health, the minister of State for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the permanent secretary of the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Cooperation.
					
					 At the talks, both sides discussed the issue of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and the issue of effecting practical cooperation in economy, culture and other fields.
					
					 Meanwhile, an agreement on cooperation between the foreign ministries of the DPRK and Uganda was signed on the same day.

articles.title: Greetings to Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian President
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria, on November 1 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the start of the revolution in Algeria.
					 The message affirmed the will to develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Algeria and sincerely wished the president and government of Algeria greater success in their efforts to consolidate the national unity and political stability and achieve the economic development and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Congolese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Congolese President
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Denis Sassou Nguesso, president of the Republic of Congo, on his 71st birthday.
					 The message sincerely wished the president good health and happiness and greater success in his noble work for the country and its people.
					
					 It expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger thanks to their common efforts.

articles.title: CPRK Condemns Leaflet-Scattering Operation in S. Korea
articles.content:
CPRK Condemns Leaflet-Scattering Operation in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Saturday released a statement clarifying a crucial stand of the DPRK assailing the south Korean puppet authorities for persistently shielding and encouraging the another  leaflet scattering operation conducted by human scum in the area of Phochon of Kyonggi Province at midnight of Friday. 
					 The statement said: 
					
					 1. The south Korean authorities should know that there will be neither dialogue between the north and the south nor improvement of the inter-Korean relations unless they suspend the leaflet scattering operation malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.  
					
					 It is the unshakable will and steadfast principled stand of the army and people of the DPRK not to pardon at any cost whoever defames the dignity of its supreme leadership. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not even dream of sitting at the negotiating table with us as long as a reckless leaflet scattering operation goes on. 
					
					 They should not forget that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK declared they would not only make sighting strikes at balloons but also blow up their base and strike the forces commanding their operations behind the scene if the leaflet scattering goes on. 
					
					2. The KPA will sternly punish and finish off those criminals involved in those operations in the name of all Koreans. 
					
					 We have the right to punish the criminals who fled to the south after committing crimes against its social system and its law and the south Korean authorities are obliged to extradite the criminals to the north side in the light of international law and practice. 
					
					If the south Korean authorities are not ready to do so, we will conduct an operation to decisively punish the human scum. 
					
					3. We will file a suit in the international organizations including the UN and world community against the south Korean authorities' leaflet scattering operation against the DPRK in an effort to build strong public opinion.
					
					 The above-said operations for defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system of the DPRK and its people being perpetrated in south Korea under the patronage of the puppet authorities are hideous crimes against humanity and human rights as they are a grave violation of international law.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean puppet group which should be brought to an international court. 
					
					 We will file a complaint in the international organizations and the world community against the puppet group's hostile act of seriously infringing upon the universally accepted international norms and order and strongly censure and condemn it.
					
					 The statement warned that the Park Geun Hye group will have to pay a dear price for scuppering the hard-won opportunity of improving the north-south relations and trampling down the compatriots' desire for reunification by making a mockery of the DPRK's good faith and challenging it.

articles.title: Chongsu Tourist Zone Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
Chongsu Tourist Zone Opens in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A ceremony took place on Thursday to open the Chongsu Tourist Zone in the DPRK to visitors.
					 The Chongsu Tourist Zone is an economic zone to be developed under the July 23, Juche 103 (2014), decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, which covers some parts of Pangsan-ri and Chongsong Workers' District in Sakju County, North Phyongan Province. Its total area is more than 3 800 hectares.
					
					 The work for opening the zone has been pushed ahead under the cooperation between DPRK's North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee and China's Liaoning Province, Dandong City People's Government and Dandong Overseas Travel Co. Ltd.
					
					 According to Kwak Jin Ho, director of the Economic Zone Development Department of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, the zone will turn into a tourist development zone equipped with modern facilities.
					
					 Its development project includes the construction of tourist service establishments and supply bases such as cultural recreation district, Korean folk village, folk hotel and production bases for specialties, livestock and marine products and fruits. Hillocks of the zone will be changed into orchards of high-yielding fruit trees as a tourist destination.
					
					 Half-day or one-day tour is mainly encouraged in the zone while its development going on as it is located in a frontier. The tourist destinations will include Chongsu and Youlgol revolutionary sites associated with activities of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, and Chongsong Bridge used during the 1950-1953 Korean War.
					
					 The tourism in the zone will provide an international tourist link between Chongsu and Dandong, China.

articles.title: New Building Putty and Paints Developed
articles.content:
New Building Putty and Paints Developed
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- New kinds of building materials have been developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to win popularity among users.
					 They include aqueous putty and organic distemper, produced by the Korea Phyongsung Trading Corporation.
					
					 The aqueous putty is made of calcium, talc, white cement and composite additive with water. It is very strong in adhesion and water resistance and easy to handle.
					
					 The organic distemper (for internal and external building walls) is made of major vehicle, mineral-salt filler and tinge and functional additives. 
					
					  This paint does not affect human body at all. The lowest temperature for its workability is 5 degrees Centigrade and its drying time is 12 hours. Its endurance at normal temperature is 5-10 years.
					
					 According to Pak Sung Gil, manager of the corporation, the above-said materials were applied to such buildings as the swimming gymnasium of Kim Il Sung University, Rungna Dolphinarium and Ponghwa Art Theatre in Pyongyang.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Are Arch Criminals of Backing Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Are Arch Criminals of Backing Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operations: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group are the arch criminals of the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations that drove the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe and increased the danger of a war, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 Citing facts to prove that the U.S. instigated the south Korean puppet authorities and human scum to scatter leaflets and provoke the DPRK, and the south Korean puppet group is shielding human scum's leaflet scattering operations, it continues:
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. and the south Korean authorities cover up such ugly color as pushing the inter-Korean relations to a worst phase while positively supporting and shielding the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations.
					
					 In order to deter the inter-Korean relations from being deteriorated, it is necessary for the south Korean authorities to stop at once shielding and conniving at human scum's anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations and halt them, to begin with.
					
					 Any dialogue between the north and the south can not be held amid the ceaseless leaflet scattering operations malignantly hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clarify their stands: whether to drive the present inter-Korean relations into an uncontrollable catastrophe or to keep the hard-won atmosphere of mending inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations can not be improved unless anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations are halted in south Korea.

articles.title: Disarmament Is Prerequisite to Ensuring Global Peace and Security: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Disarmament Is Prerequisite to Ensuring Global Peace and Security: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Mankind can never take the road of its development in the peaceful world unless disarmament is realized, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia are fraught with the greatest danger of a war and the issue of ensuring peace in Northeast Asia which assumes a complicated and special nature due to intervention by big powers and the UN is directly linked with the issue of ensuring global peace and security, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is working hard to ignite a new war by escalating the tension on the peninsula and disturbing peace. U.S. nuclear weapons and WMDs are massively stockpiled and its huge forces are present in this region.
					
					 This is threatening peace and security not only in the Asia-Pacific but the world.
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea is a prerequisite to the disarmament on the peninsula. The U.S. forces in south Korea are the root cause of an arms race and the danger of a war in the peninsula as they are aimed to invade the DPRK to all intents and purposes.
					
					 Nuclear disarmament should aim to totally eliminate nuclear weapons worldwide and, for the present, there should be an international legal document with binding force calling for a total ban on the use of nuclear weapons and providing an unconditional guarantee for non-use of nuclear weapons against non-nuclear weapons states.
					
					 The U.S., which was the first to use nuclear weapons in the world and is the biggest possessor of nuclear weapons in the world, should take the lead in effecting nuclear disarmament.
					
					 The DPRK will positively join in the regional and global activities for disarmament and the world peace-loving people's struggle being under way as a major link in the chain efforts to shatter the imperialists' aggression and war moves.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Advocating "Defense of Human Rights"
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Advocating "Defense of Human Rights"
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. "advocacy of human rights" is, in essence, one for bringing down social systems and a theory of aggression and the one for world domination, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary.
					 The U.S. ruling quarters' talk about "defence of human rights" is a crafty move to cover up its worst human rights abuses.
					
					 The U.S. is malignantly slandering the DPRK which provides the people with the most genuine human rights because it is pursuing a sinister aim to stifle socialism in the DPRK with inveterate repugnancy toward the socialist system, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 There can be no genuine human rights in places where sovereignty and peace are infringed upon.
					
					 The U.S. aggression and war amount to an encroachment on sovereignty, state-sponsored terrorism and heinous human rights abuses.
					
					 To protect human rights precisely means protecting the country's sovereignty, social system and peace.
					
					 The DPRK's dynamic advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism is to defend its genuine human rights to the last and enjoy them forever. No force can ever break this unshakable faith and will.
					
					 If the U.S. tries to seriously encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK while hyping its non-existent "human rights issue" to an extreme pitch, it will certainly force the former to pay for all crimes with the might of Songun it has built up so far.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il for Defending and Glorifying Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il for Defending and Glorifying Socialism
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially praises leader Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician who perfectly established and systematized the Juche-based doctrine of socialism and distinguished politician who protected the socialist cause from all imperialist reactionary offensives and made a new history of building a thriving socialist nation.
					 More than half a century-long history of his leading the revolution is shining as a glorious history which advanced under the red flag of socialism, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 He started his Songun revolutionary leadership with firm faith in the victory of Korean-style socialism pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and consistently adhered to the principle of socialism all his revolutionary life.
					
					 But for his leadership, the idea of socialism would not have been protected from getting degenerated in the upheaval created by all hues of opportunism including modern revisionism in the international arena and the fate of socialism would not have been saved from the vicious moves of renegades of revolution and imperialists.
					
					 His whole life was a heroic one of the champion of justice and peerless patriot who built an invincible socialist power on this land while resolutely defending the socialist idea and system on the forefront standing in confrontation with imperialism.
					
					 The history of start and advance of socialism records feats of many theoreticians and politicians but it knows no such great man as Kim Jong Il who dedicated his all to the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 The events and revolutionary changes specially recorded in the struggle for defending socialism in the 20th and 21st centuries are closely associated with the august name of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Accused of Evading Her Responsibility
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Accused of Evading Her Responsibility 
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on October 30 an editorial denounced the present puppet chief executive for evading her all responsibilities.
					 The editorial said that the chief executive on October 29 made a "policy speech" at the "National Assembly" but it was nothing different from that last year and on the contrary it increased skepticism about her understanding of the situation and ability to administer state affairs.
					
					 There are a flurry of sensitive issues of various kinds including the abandonment of the transfer of the right to the wartime operation control, inter-Korean dialogue aborted due to the leaflets scattering operations of the ultra-right organizations and uproar over her reneging on election promises.
					
					 The editorial stressed what the people want is her correct understanding of the south Korean reality and respect for the people's will.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Censured for Bringing Profits to U.S. Munitions Industries
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Censured for Bringing Profits to U.S. Munitions Industries 
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on Friday accused the puppet authorities for bringing huge profits to the U.S. munitions industries.
					 It has been disclosed that the authorities are purchasing F-35s from the Lockheed Martin Co. at too higher prices, the editorial said.
					
					 This means that the authorities allow any loss in order to keep "good relations" with the U.S., it ridiculed.
					
					 The alliance with the U.S. is not an option for decreasing the security expenses but a basic factor of increasing them, it held.
					
					 It urged the authorities to change the military system depending on the U.S. only.

articles.title: Japan's Historical Circle Recognizes Coercion Involved in Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
articles.content:
Japan's Historical Circle Recognizes Coercion Involved in Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army 
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A history institute of Japan on Oct. 15 issued a statement recognizing the coercion involved in the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The institute claimed it was an evident fact that women were forcibly drafted by the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 It said that flesh traffic was openly committed through abduction, deception, blackmail, etc. at that time.
					
					 The disclosure of the assertion of the institute recognizing the sexual slavery enforced by the army once again brought to light the shameless nature of the Japanese government which has refused to admit its past crimes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Syria
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Oct. 26.
					 Adnan Ismail, general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to conduct various activities to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's sacred revolutionary career and undying feats.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Bangladesh
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting, seminar, lecture, photo exhibition and film show took place in Bangladesh on Oct. 24 and 25 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" was screened.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, introduced the brief biography of Kim Jong Il, and said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the outstanding leader who made the immortal contribution to the human cause of independence by developing in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into the political, ideological and military power and ushered in a fresh heyday of building a thriving nation through his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The exploits he performed for the people's happiness and prosperity and the sacred cause for the global cause of independence will remain forever in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressive humankind.
					
					 We will conduct more brisk activities for supporting the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK who are dynamically advancing toward a fresh victory under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, said that the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il which is recognized as the genuine guiding idea in the era of independence was formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism by Kim Jong Un. The Korean people are now full of the will to steadily advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Introduces Korean Music Prodigies
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Introduces Korean Music Prodigies 
						
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Korean music prodigies" on its website on October 23. 
					 Music prodigies of the DPRK are drawing attention of the international community, the article said. It noted Ma Sin A arranged piano programs and skillfully played them, startling experts, Choe Jang Hung won the first youngest prize by successfully performing piano music requiring high artistry and playing skill in the 20th International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest and 7-year-old Choe Ji Ye came first at the 2013-2014 piano concours.
					
					 They graduated from the Kyongsang Kindergarten in Pyongyang, the article said, and went on:
					
					 There is a particular early musical education system in the DPRK and the Kyongsang Kindergarten plays an important role. 
					
					 The kindergarten is like a cradle of worldwide music prodigies.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Celebrated Abroad 
 Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- World progressive people grandly celebrated the important days of the DPR of Korea. 
					 The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, Thailand-Korea Friendship Association and other personages and organizations of different countries made public statements on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK and the 88th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union. 
					
					 Preparatory committees were formed in Peru and Thailand to significantly celebrate the 17th anniversary of his election as general secretary of the WPK and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Delegations of political parties and personages of different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in their countries and political parties of Mexico and personages of Pakistan, Benin and Nigeria sent floral baskets and bouquets to the DPRK embassies in their countries. 
					
					 A central meeting took place in Lima of Peru, seminar on the Juche idea in Helsinki of Finland, Kimjongilia shows in Nakhodka of Russia and Ulan Bator of Mongolia and other political and cultural events in the five continents of the world. 
					
					 Foreign media widely introduced the WPK on the same occasions. 
					
					 Works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were published in booklet, carried in bulletins and posted on websites by political parties, organizations and institutions of Russia, Laos, Germany, Romania, Serbia, Sweden, Britain, Austria, Spain, Mexico, Peru and Nigeria.
					
					 The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in their bulletins introduced in detail the course of the WPK. 
					
					 The Russian paper Rio Panorama, the Iranian paper Iran News, the Syrian Central TV, the Bulgarian paper Iskra, the DR Congo paper L'Avenir, websites of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) and the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK and other foreign media carried special articles titled "For founding the popular revolutionary party", "Kim Jong Il, immortal exploits for party building" and "Leader Kim Jong Un of mother party" illustrated with portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their photos and photos of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el campo de construccion del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el campo de construccion del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 1 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, realizo una visita de orientacion sobre el campo de construccion del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang y presento las tareas para desarrollar esa zona a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					El recorrio primero varios puntos de la segunda terminal del aeropuerto y averiguo en detalles el estado de ejecucion de la obra.
					
					Durante el recorrido anterior, asigne la tarea de acabar la obra de segunda terminal introduciendo la tendencia mundial y buenas experiencias de otros paises y resaltando el caracter Juche y la nacionalidad, pero no la hicieron asi, senalo.
					
					Hay defectos en la formacion del interior, inclusive los salones de tramitacion de partida y espera, y las redes de servicio e instalaciones no estan distribuidas bien en el espacio de la terminal, critico y agrego que si la obra termina como se hace ahora, va a ser una copia de la terminal de otro pais.
					
					Apunto que esos defectos se deben a los disenadores que no asimilaron bien la idea del partido sobre la estetica arquitectonica, o sea, el caracter Juche y la nacionalidad son los puntos vitales y claves de la arquitectura.
					
					Debemos levantar cada obra arquitectonica poniendo de relieve nuestra moda, nuestras peculiaridades y nuestra nacionalidad, dijo y subrayo que deben acabar la construccion de segunda terminal como simbolo de la Corea del Songun, rostro de nuestro pais y puerta de Pyongyang y distribuir y acondicionar perfectamente las redes de servicio e instalaciones para que se pueda facilitar mejor el confort de los pasajeros.
					
					Dio la tarea de interrumpir temporalmente la actual obra de acabado del interior, revisar los proyectos de formacion y completar de nuevo el diseno de remodelacion.
					
					Al recorrer la pista de aterrizaje del aeropuerto cuya construccion termino principalmente, el Mariscal averiguo el estado de asfaltado y las senales de pista de diferentes tipos.
					
					Al mirar la pista de aterrizaje que se pierde en el horizonte, se puso contento diciendo que se hizo posible glorificar mas las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, ya que quedo modernizada esta pista usada por ellas para el cumplimiento de la causa de independencia antiimperialista y la de revolucion mundial.
					
					Y evaluo a los constructores del ejercito quienes construyen bien la pista segun la voluntad del Partido y exhorto a acabar la obra en lo cualitativo.
					
					El Mariscal vio la maqueta en relieve de la zona del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang y presento las tareas para desarrollar esa zona conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					Presento el proyecto de construir mas en adelante nueva terminal y pista al frente del aeropuerto en actual construccion y convertir como aeropuerto de talla mundial al construir la ferrovia de alta velocidad y autopista desde el centro de la capital hasta el aeropuerto.
					
					Hay que formar de manera majestuosa la zona del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang para poder mostrar visualmente el aspecto orgulloso del regimen socialista de nuestro pais y el indice del pais civilizad, apunto.
					
					Ordeno transformar modernamente la region de Sunan, construir los invernaderos particulares en las granjas del municipio de Sunan cerca del aeropuerto y convertir en las granjas-modelo de talla mundial las comunas de Thaek-am y Wonhwa donde estan impregnadas las huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Mariscal presento las tareas y remedios inclusive los temas para definir correctamente el orden en el desarrollo de la zona del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang, disenar en el maximo nivel, fijar el periodo de inicio de la obra y suministrar las manos de obras y los materiales.
					
					Le acompanaron el premier Pak Pong Ju, el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Nung O y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con premier ugandes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con premier ugandes
Kampala, 31 de octubre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el 31 de octubre en la sede del gobierno de Uganda con el primer ministro de este pais africano, Ruhakana Rugunda.
					Tras dar calida bienvenida a Kim, el premier anfitrion expreso su voluntad de fortalecer mas la cooperacion entre los dos paises.
					
					A la ocasion asistieron el ministro de Salud Publica, Kang Ha Guk, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, So Kil Bok, el embajador coreano en Uganda, Myong Kyong Chol, y otros acompanantes, por la parte coreana, y por la ugandesa, el segundo vicepremier Moses Ali, el ministro encargado de los asuntos generales de la oficina del premier Tarsis Kavweger, el canciller interino Asuman Kiyingi y otros funcionarios.

articles.title: Conversaciones por sectores entre RPDC y Uganda
articles.content:
Conversaciones por sectores entre RPDC y Uganda
Kampala, 31 de octubre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el 31 de octubre en esta capital las conversaciones por sectores entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Uganda. 
					Participaron en las platicas por la parte coreana el ministro de Salud Publica, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores y el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero y por la ugandesa, el ministro de Estado del Ministerio de Salud Publica, el ministro de Estado del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y el secretario permanente del Ministerio de Comercio, Industria y Cooperacion.
					
					Ambas partes discutieron los temas para fortalecer mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y realizar la cooperacion sustancial en la economia, la cultura y otros dominios. 
					
					El mismo dia, fue firmado un acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre los Ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores de ambos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente congoleno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente congoleno 
						
Pyongyang, 1 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este sabado un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Congo, Denis Sassou-Nguesso, con motivo del 71o aniversario de su cumpleanos. 
					El remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario buena salud, felicidad y mayores exitos en su noble trabajo por el pais y el pueblo. 
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se amplien y se fortalezcan mas por los esfuerzos conjuntos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 60o aniversario de inicio de revolucion argelina
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 60o aniversario de inicio de revolucion argelina 
						
Pyongyang, 1 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este sabado un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, con motivo del 60o aniversario del inicio de la revolucion de Argelia. 
					El remitente reafirma la voluntad de la RPDC de desarrollar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y desea de todo corazon al mandatario y a su gobierno mayores exitos en los esfuerzos por consolidar la unidad nacional y la estabilidad politica y lograr el desarrollo economico y la prosperidad del pais.
